name: AR Passthrough Demo
description:
Trying out using AR Passthrough on Quest 2 to visualize some of our mod in real space.

Enable Passthrough mode as per https://developer.oculus.com/experimental/experimental-overview/, ie

To enable Experimental Features to run on your Oculus Quest, you’ll need put your device in Experimental Mode by using the following ADB command:

adb shell setprop debug.oculus.experimentalEnabled 1

Sideload the APK to Quest 2 and run it.

Hold trigger button to grab object, rotate thumb stick to rotate object, push / pull thumbstick to push / pull object.
